017package de.mnl.osgi.jul2osgi.lib;
018
019import de.mnl.osgi.jul2osgi.lib.LogManager.LogInfo;
020import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
021
022/**
023 * Called by {@link LogManager} in order to send the {@link LogRecord}
024 * to the OSGi log service.
025 */
026public interface LogRecordHandler {
027
028    /**
029     * Asks the handler to process the record. If the record has successfully
030     * been processed, returns {@code true}. If the record cannot be 
031     * processed, returns {@code false}. In the latter case, the record
032     * should be kept and processing should be attempted again when a
033     * new handler has been set. 
034     * 
035     * @param logInfo the log record
036     * @return the result
037     */
038    public boolean process(LogInfo logInfo);
039
040    /**
041     * Process the events from the buffer. In this case, the 
042     * thread context isn't related with the events.
043     *
044     * @param logInfos the log infos
045     */
046    public void processBuffered(LogInfo[] logInfos);
047}
